Container.Name: materialious
Container.Overview: Materialious is a privacy respecting frontend for YouTube built ontop of Invidious.
Container.Requires:
For security reasons regarding CORS, your hosted instance of Materialious must serve as the value for the Access-Control-Allow-Origin header on Invidious.
Invidious doesn't provide a simple way to modify CORS, so this must be done with your reverse proxy.
Please see the documentation on further information on how to do this if you are unsure. https://materialio.us/

Config.Name: Indidious Instance URL
Config.Description: Specify the URL to your proxied Invidious Instance. Do not include a trailing backslash as this will cause issues.

Config.Name: Return YouTube Dislikes URL
Config.Description: Leave blank or delete this variable to disable.

Config.Name: SponsorBlock URL
Config.Description: Leave blank or delete this variable to disable.

Config.Name: DeArrow URL
Config.Description: Specify the URL to your DeArrow Instance.

Config.Name: DeArrow Thumbnail Instance URL
Config.Description: Specify the URL to your DeArrow Thumbnail Instance.

Config.Name: Materialious Default Overrides
Config.Description: Set your default overrides for Materialous. Refer to the documentation for a list of all configurable options.
